name: peshawar bolster
description:
Phulkari are wedding dowry blankets that brides in Pakistan spend ages working on before they can get married. We took inspiration from some of these classic designs and put them on linen and into pillow form. 

17" x 32" (Pillow insert not included)

Embroidered motifs. 
Sheesha mirror details.
Hidden zipper closure.

Wash care instructions: 
Spot clean only. 

Made in India
100% Linen

name: glow-in-the-dark juniorbeads
description:
100% silicone children's jewelry. 
Glow in the Dark Beads. 
Colorful, chic, and free of unwanted chemicals.
Easily cleaned with dish soap and water, also dishwasher safe.
Perfect for ages 3 and up.

Designer: chewbeads

name: zig zag bag
description:
Our iconic pumpkin bags feature leather handles, a double lined interior, and an inside pocket. Versatile, roomy, and collapsible.

15"wide X 17.5" tall, 17" straps

Opens to a large carrying space of 27" wide

Made of sturdy cotton canvas and leather
 
To clean, remove leather straps. Wash alone in cold water and hang to dry.

name: mason jar
description:
Add a little bit of country with this new twist on an old classic! Whether you use it as a flower vase or as a drinking cup, our Colorware Mason Jars are sure to delight!

5-1/8"H x 3"W (Opening 2-1/2"W) 
16 oz, 1 pint
High-fired ceramic 
Dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator safe 

Designer: Fishs Eddy

name: cotton voile scarves
description:
Nice, big, cotton scarves...perfect for summer! Wrap around your neck, drape over your shoulders on a chilly evening, use as a wrap at the beach or a makeshift tablecloth for an impromptu dinner party. These might be the most versatile items in our shop!

Machine wash cold separately, delicate cycle, tumble dry low, do not bleach. Iron at medium setting. Only gets better with age and washing!

41 x 82 inches
100% cotton

Designer: john robshaw

name: berry baskets
description:
Bring the green market home with our ceramic berry baskets. A beautiful way to contain and compliment fruit!

3-2/8"H x 5-6/8"W x 5-6/8" L
High-fired ceramic 
Dishwasher and microwave safe
Stackable

Designer: Fishs Eddy

name: tribal pouches
description:
Carry our new tribal style pouches as a clutch, use it as a pouch, or even fit your tablet in the roomy and versatile accessory.

11.5" x 8.5" 

Made of sturdy cotton canvas and leather.

To clean, spot wash and hang to dry.

Designed in the USA. Manufactured in China.

Designer: Rosanna

name: peak dec pillow - set of 2
description:
After using this sturdy fabric to make printed rugs, John realized it would make great casual pillows. The heavy weave takes the block print reluctantly, creating a unique texture.

<u>SET OF 2</u> 20" x 20" pillows - inserts included

- hand block printed on heavy weight cotton
- hidden zipper closure

100% woven cotton

Designer: john robshaw

name: Key Chain Loop
description:
Our newest keychain addition. This handsome leather key keeper snaps securely onto just about anything.

- lobster style clasp and key ring with gold toned hardware
- can be attached to keys or a bag
- white enamel snap detail

- overall size:  1-3/4 x 6-1/4"

Designer: russell + hazel

name: polka dot mug
description:
These dishes are spot on! And eclectic mix of shapes with polka dots all over. Pepper these pieces in with other patterns to add instant fun!

3-4/8"H x 3-6/8"W
15oz
High-fired ceramic 
Dishwasher and microwave safe

Designer: Fishs Eddy

name: the train case
description:
The apple and bee train case is capital in Style & Substance made with all organic cotton included is a small mirror within the lid. 

As with all of the apple and bee range it comes with the trade mark logo toggle and apple and bee lining. 

You won't need anything else for when you travel.

260 x 150mm

name: stretchy bracelets
description:
Handmade of white coral beads and semi-precious stones. Perfect for summer and great to mix with what you already have or just beautiful on its own.

Each one is made to order, so yours may vary slightly from the pictures.

Designer: joelle van roekel

name: napkins
description:
Set a memorable table by mixing prints. We haven't met a combination we don't like.

22" X 22" (Set of 4)

Screen Printed
Prints compliment & coordinate, can be layered


WASHCARE INSTRUCTIONS:
Machine wash warm, tumble dry, iron at medium setting if necessary.

Made in India
100% Cotton

Designer: john robshaw

name: tassel key chain
description:
The same premium grade leather found on our pouches and cases is now available on a key chain. A collection of leather strips create a finished tassel to attach to a bag or keys. 

- Lobster style clasp and key ring with gold toned hardware
- Can be attached to keys or a bag
 
Size: 1-1/4 x 6-3/4”

Designer: russell + hazel

name: loha napkins
description:
Your holiday table deserves to be decked in rich eggplants, sparking golds, and shimmering silvers. Modern yet classically beautiful, these prints are ideal for mixing, matching and layering.

22" X 22" (set of 4)

Screen Printed

WASHCARE INSTRUCTIONS: 
Machine wash warm, tumble dry, iron at medium setting if necessary.

Designer: john robshaw

name: hobo ikat bag
description:
Whether headed to school, the gym, the beach, or the grocery store, every woman needs a second bag. Stand out with a new Ikat-patterned hobo bag, or a bold and brightly patterened satchel.

17" x 17.5", 11" handle

Velcro Closure

Made of sturdy cotton canvas 

To clean, wash alone in cold water. Hang to dry.

name: ceramic egg crate
description:
A must-have for anyone expecting an MTV Cribs crew to drop by...

Dimensions: 5-7/8"L x 4-2/8"W x 1-5/8"H
Capacity: 6 eggs
Dishwasher and microwave safe

Designer: Fishs Eddy

name: ikat handbags
description:
Calling all fashionistas: Make a slouchy statement at the beach, the market, or on the street with our new ikat printed bags. The Ikat bags feature sturdy leather handles, a double lined interior, and an inside pocket.

Versatile and very roomy, collapsible bag; 15" x 17.5", 17" straps, opens up to a large carrying space of 27" wide.

Made of sturdy cotton canvas and leather. To clean remove leather straps and wash alone in cold water. Hang to dry.

Designer: Rosanna Inc.

name: joni scarf
description:
A beautiful oblong scarf with handmade detailing. 

75/25 viscose/wool

26” x 76”

Designer: elizabeth gillet

name: lucia 50 hour soy candle
description: Burning cleanly for over 50 hours, all Lucia candles are a safe and environmentally friendly alternative to existing petroleum based paraffin candles. Organic Soy is sourced from farming collectives all over the world encouraging fair-trade communities. Designer: lucia

name: botanical journal
description:
Our brand new botanical journals have been a labor of love as we worked to perfect every detail. The journals feature a soft linen cover printed with our signature hand-painted florals, smythe sewn binding for durability, and luxurious interior pages printed with metallic gold lines and accents.

Every aspect of the journal, from the paper to the printing to the binding, is proudly manufactured in the U.S.A. Printed using FSC certified paper stocks.

- 5"x7" size (about .5" thick)
- 240 lined pages
- Smythe sewn binding
- Metallic gold end papers & interior printing
- Made in the U.S.A. 

Designer: rifle paper co.

name: hammock pillow - set of 2
description:
All-over designs in sorbet hues. Try our Hammock pillows with gray bed linens for just the right pop of color.

Set of 2 20" x 20" pillows - inserts included

- hand block printed
- hand stitched edging
- hidden zipper closure

55% Linen/ 45% Cotton

Designer: john robshaw

name: semi precious stone earrings
description:
These stunning beaded earrings are handmade in L.A. Eache one filled with semi-precious stones and gold faceted beads. Flexible enough to molded into long drop earrings or hoops. Perfect for everyday and special occassions. We're smitten!!

Designer: ettika

name: maine scarf
description:
A stunning, graphic, cold weather scarf.

92/8 wool/silk

26” x 74”

Designer: elizabeth gillet

name: business card holder
description:
Ideal for business cards and credit cards, this stylish and functional mini leather envelope comes complete with a complimentary cotton twill lining. Snap enclosure keeps your belongings safe.

- gold toned hardware
- ideal for holding business cards and credit cards
- perfect for him or her.
 
Size: 4-1/4” x 2-7/8”

Designer: russell + hazel

name: derby decorative pillow - set of 2
description:
After using this sturdy fabric to make printed rugs, John realized it would make great casual pillows. The heavy weave takes the block print reluctantly, creating a unique texture.

Set of 2 20" x 20" pillows - inserts included

- hand block printed on heavy weight cotton
- hidden zipper closure

Designer: john robshaw

name: measuring spoons
description: Ceramic set of measuring spoons by designer Rae Dunn for Magenta.

name: woven khadi throw
description:
When in India, John stocks up on hand woven khadi. This season he made his own. Use these lightweight throws at home, or toss one into your bag for the beach.

Throw 50 x 70"

WASHCARE INSTRUCTIONS:
Machine wash cold, separately. Gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Iron at low temperature. Line dry.

Made In India
100% Cotton

name: vintage ribbon wrap bracelet
description:
Gold beaded pink vintage ribbon bracelet wraps around the wrist 6 times. Looks great when stacked with other bangles. Handmade in L.A. Designer: ettika

Pin It

name: compact cosmetic bag
description:
Our new Compact Cosmetic Bag is designed to fit all your essential items for a weekend away. Unlike some travel bags, it won't take up too much room, so it's size and shape are key features. Made with the highest quality and also using genuine leather, this is a luxury item - still at a great price. Comes with its own dust bag. Size: 10.25 inches x 4.5 inches Designer: apple&bee

Pin It

name: printed throws
description:
We printed on a woven to give you softness and texture, as well vivid color and pattern.

50 x 70"

WASHCARE INSTRUCTIONS:
Machine wash warm separately, delicate cycle, tumble dry low, do not bleach, iron at medium setting if necessary, do not dry clean.

Made In India
100% Cotton

Designer: john robshaw

name: journey bag
description:
Carry all your make-up essentials in the apple and bee new medium make-up. Organic printed cotton on the outside with a lush hemp lining and a zipper closure! 

The medium make-up comes in all the new season designs and patterns. The medium make-up is a must for busy people on the run.

The new medium make-up bag is 220 x 140mm

name: foldout WC
description:
This is one of our true classics, the fold out bag is the perfect combination of sophisticated style, design and function, all of which will definitely add a touch of class and elegance to any trip that you might be taking. Organic cotton on the outside and waterproof inside, with 3 separate compartment and and a hanger hook, it comes in all our designs. The foldout WC bag is 260 x 190mm Designer: apple&bee

Pin It

name: canvas eco tote
description:
This Canvas Eco tote is a colourful new design from the signature Apple&Bee range. With inside pockets and lots of great compartments, this super practical tote is great to take shopping and will keep all your valuables safe. Throw it in the wash if it gets dirty and line dry in the shade to keep its shape. Designer: apple&bee

Pin It

name: thank you notes
description:
Garden Thank You Cards: Features bold illustrated florals that wrap around to the back of the card in hues of pink, marigold, peach, red, and greens. 

Gold Floral Thank You Cards: Features gold metallic text set against a bold, colorful hand-painted background of florals to create a stunning card. 

Boxed set of 8.

4 1/4"x 5 1/2" when folded
Blank interior
Matching soft white envelopes
Printed full color on natural white cover paper
featuring metallic gold foil printing
Printed locally in the US 

Designer: rifle paper co.

name: vintage telephone notepad
description:
Inspired by old telephone message pads, our new notepad features a vintage-style illustration against a pale pink background. Set beside your phone or use as an everyday pad. Includes 85 tear-off sheets, full color printing on natural white paper.

- 4.25"x6.5" notepad
- Printed on natural white cover paper
- 85 tear-off sheets
- Printed locally in the U.S.

name: heart whisk
description:
Made with Love. Silicone coated heart shaped wires gradating from pink to red. Size: 3.75" x 11.5"

Pin It

name: chewbeads necklace
description: Moms are the best at mixing chic and practical...here's just another way to do just that!! Beads are made with 100% silicone (similar to pacifiers & nipples) Soft on babies gums and emerging teeth Easily cleaned with dish soap & water, also dishwasher safe! No BPA, PVC, Phthalates, Cadmium, or Lead Necklaces have a breakaway clasp for added safety Necklaces are a great sensory tool to help your baby focus while nursing Bracelets are a colorful reminder of which side you've just nursed Also available as a bracelet here

name: tea lovers travel mug
description:
We've searched all over for the perfect travel mug and I think we've finally found it! Sick and tired of our coffee and tea tasting like aluminum, this porcelain, double-walled mug is a great solution. Cute, practical, environmentally friendly and well-priced :o) The mugs are made with a double wall porcelain to provide insulation for very hot liquids. The porcelain cup comes with reusable silicone lid. Best part? The cups are microwave and dishwasher safe!! Hand wash the silicone lid. We know everyone loved the polka-dot versions, but these new styles are larger and come with a silicone wrap to keep your hands away from the heat! Teabag string can be wrapped around the tea pot button to hold it in place while steeping. Dimensions: 3.5" diameter x 6" tall Holds 16 ounces

Pin It

name: dopp kit
description:
The perfect size- not too small, not too large, with an easy to clean lining that is good for ladies & gents.

   *Water resistant vinyl lining
   *Built in pockets
   *Ykk metal zipper closure
   *Great for mens travel and ladies makeup bag

WASHCARE INSTRUCTIONS: Spot clean only.

5 X 11 X 6 inches

Designer: john robshaw

name: whiskey stones
description:
Made of natural Vermont soapstone, these cool "rocks" are the perfect way to chill your favorite spirits without diluting (or altering) their flavor. Set of 9 comes in it's own gift box.

Designer: teroforma

name: ipad case
description:
Fun and graphic all of our prints will make a statement in those dull and drab airports. Three new fabulous yet gender neutral prints! Leather wristlet, Front pocket, Coordinating striped liner, leather pull, YKK metal zipper closure, perfect for your commute or travel 8.25" X 10" X 1" WASHCARE INSTRUCTIONS: Spot clean only. Designer: john robshaw

Pin It

name: it's a wrap necklace
description:
Rethinking vintage is how Lenora Dame would describe her approach to jewelry design. The unexpected mix of materials and color define stand out pieces for the bold spirited, while more subtle combinations make the line accessible to a broad audience. Made with decoupaged fabric balls. Length: 18" with an 3" Extension Designer: lenora dame

Pin It

name: batik coffee and tea canisters
description:
Ceramic with a cork lid. 

Coffee: 7.5 " x 7.5" x 5"

Tea: 4.25 " x 4.25" x 6"

Designer: Brenda Holzke

name: gurglepots
description:
Produces whimsical gurgling sound. Crafted of durable stoneware. Large holds 42 ounces (6.5"W x 9" H) Minis hold 12 ounces (6" H x 2.25" W) Gurgles with or without ice. The large are perfectly versatile for fresh cut flowers or as a pitcher and the minis are great as bud vases, creamers or to use for sauces. Designer: Matt Ellison New shipment due in on 6/26/13. All orders will be shipped out the following day.

Pin It

name: blabla canvas backpacks
description:
SO cute for your preschooler. Durable, roomy, machine washable and machine washable.

Made from durable, thick canvas
Adjustable straps
Magnetic button closure

Dimensions: 9 x 11 x 3

Designer: blabla

name: whiskey lovers set
description:
Includes 6 whiskey stones in muslin bag

Includes 2 mouth blown Awa whiskey rocks tumblers

Beautifully boxed set of stones and glasses: 8 fluid ounces each 2.5 inches tall

name: prayer mat warming baskets
description:
A network of rural Wolof women in nine Senegalese villages are working together to create beautiful handcrafted baskets for export. Using locally grown millet stalks and strips of plastic used to make prayer mats and rugs, the women bring supplemental income to their households by weaving baskets between their daily duties.

Origin: Senegal
Size: [Small] 11" diameter [Large] 13" diameter
Materials: Millet stalks, plastic strips

name: signe bowl large
description: The signe bowls can be used in a conventional oven, so that when you start cutting the pie the beautiful pattern inside will appear. The bowls are handmade in stoneware clay. Available in two patterns. The signe bowls can be washed in the dishwasher. Designer: Karin Eriksson Share

name: vessel: chloe with decoration
description: 9" tall x 5" diameter. White ceramic with decals A pattern somewhat flowery, somewhat buggy. available in turquoise. perch! products are environmentally friendly, using low impact materials and processes, non-toxic finishes and byproducts. Made by hand in Brooklyn, New York. Designer: perch! Share

name: farmer's market plum basket
description:
Fine bone china "baskets" replicate shapes traditionally found at farmer's markets. Authentic details taken from real berry baskets impart true charm to these surprisingly strong containers. The smooth, glossy finish reflects the colors of the fruits and veggies displayed within. 5.5 inch square x 3 inches high. Designer: roost

Share

name: tilt bowl large
description:
Porcelain.

Handmade in Denmark.

8 inches in diameter.

Available in white with red seam.

Works well for display, full of fruit, as a pasta bowl or salad bowl.  Clean, beautiful and totally versatile.  Makes a great wedding gift!

Designer: anne black

name: multi-birds mobile
description: 13 inch diameter mobile with adjustable length. Knitted by Peruvian artisans with high quality natural fibers. 100% cotton. Designer: blabla Share

description:
The name "LoooLo" is a visual representation of "100%", symbolizing our commitment to every aspect of the design process--from making the choice to use organic materials for production, to considering the environmental footprint our products leave at the end of their useful lives.

name: mobile
description:

Also available made with heavy cardstock in bright colors.  Perfect for a child's room, over a crib, or in any grownup space for a bit of whimsey.

5.5 x 28 inches

in richmond, va?  stop by our shop at 5807 patterson avenue and see them for yourself.  or, email us and we'll deliver it to you for free!

round mirror held by thick wooden frames evoke the glamour of a luxury liner.  Shiny brass trim on the inner rim accentuates the clean and simple design.
